nodes.text: Stationed onboard the Death Star during the First Galactic Civil War, this stormtrooper was part of a patrol that was sent to investigate a security alert from Docking Bay 327 commanded by officer Pol Treidum. After unlocking the doors and finding the droids C-3PO and R2-D2, who claimed that the rebels imprisoned them inside the storage compartment, this stormtrooper was assigned to stay and guard the control room, and also ultimately allowed C-3PO and R2-D2 to leave under the pretense that the latter needed to be brought to maintenance due to its circuits being "overrun."
